remarks: The set of scalars of a subring algebra.  (Contributed by Stefan O'Rear, 27-Nov-2014.)  (Revised by Mario Carneiro, 4-Oct-2015.)  (Revised by Thierry Arnoux, 16-Jun-2019.)
statement:
srapart.a $e |- ( ph -> A = ( ( subringAlg ` W ) ` S ) ) $.
srapart.s $e |- ( ph -> S C_ ( Base ` W ) ) $.
srasca $p |- ( ph -> ( W |`s S ) = ( Scalar ` A ) ) $.
